title: （加速主義）鳳凰衛視在美否認香港是中國的
contents:
https://twitter.com/charliekirk11/status/1247300225229680640

女記者:Are you co-operating with China?
Trump : Who're you working for? China?
女記者 : NO I'M WORKING FOR HONG KONG
Trump : Who're you with? 
女記者 : HONG KONG PHOENIX TV
Trump : Who was that? China?
女記者 : It's based in Hong Kong
